## StoreState type

全局状态

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StoreState = {
    [moduleName: string]: ModuleState | undefined;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [ModuleState](./react-web.modulestate.md)

## Remarks

由多个 [ModuleState](./react-web.modulestate.md) 按 moduleName 组合起来的全部 Store 状态
